title: Add missing generated favicon assets and ensure correct heart-style icons

requirements.summary: Add the missing favicon image files referenced by frontend/index.html under frontend/public/assets/generated so the browser can load and display the favicon.
acceptanceCriteria: The following files exist at build time in frontend/public/assets/generated: favicon-16.dim_16x16.png, favicon-32.dim_32x32.png, apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png, android-chrome-192.dim_192x192.png, android-chrome-512.dim_512x512.png.
Running the app serves the favicon assets at /assets/generated/<filename> without 404s.
Opening the deployed app in a fresh/incognito browser session shows the favicon in the tab (and the Apple touch icon is discoverable via the link tag).

file_operations.description: Add the generated 16x16 favicon asset at this exact path and filename so the existing <link rel='icon' sizes='16x16'> in frontend/index.html resolves without 404.
Add the generated 32x32 favicon asset at this exact path and filename so the existing <link rel='icon' sizes='32x32'> in frontend/index.html resolves without 404.
Add the generated Apple touch icon asset at this exact path and filename so the existing <link rel='apple-touch-icon' sizes='180x180'> in frontend/index.html resolves without 404.
Add the generated 192x192 icon asset at this exact path and filename so the existing <link rel='icon' sizes='192x192'> in frontend/index.html resolves without 404.
Add the generated 512x512 icon asset at this exact path and filename so the existing <link rel='icon' sizes='512x512'> in frontend/index.html resolves without 404.

requirements.summary: Ensure generated favicon images match the existing centered pink heart-on-white-circle style at all required sizes.
acceptanceCriteria: All generated favicon images depict a centered pink heart on a white circular background.
The heart remains recognizable and centered at 16x16 and 32x32 sizes (no cropping).

file_operations.description: Regenerate/adjust the 16x16 favicon artwork so it matches the app’s heart icon style (centered pink heart on a white circular background) and remains legible without cropping at 16x16.
Regenerate/adjust the 32x32 favicon artwork so it matches the app’s heart icon style (centered pink heart on a white circular background) and remains centered and recognizable at 32x32.
Regenerate/adjust the 180x180 Apple touch icon artwork so it matches the app’s heart icon style (centered pink heart on a white circular background) with appropriate padding/centering.
Regenerate/adjust the 192x192 icon artwork so it matches the app’s heart icon style (centered pink heart on a white circular background) with consistent proportions.
Regenerate/adjust the 512x512 icon artwork so it matches the app’s heart icon style (centered pink heart on a white circular background) with consistent proportions for high-res usage.
